content.rendered:
Turn on the light or use night lights in your child’s bedroom when saying goodnight!

Your child is unlikely to be wearing any hearing devices in bed and will be better able to see you and lip read.

 

Download the Real Life Tip infographic.

excerpt.rendered: Turn on the light or use night lights in your child’s bedroom when saying goodnight! Your child is unlikely to be wearing any hearing devices in bed and will be better able to see you and lip read.   Download the Real Life Tip infographic.
